body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Tank Waisted Maxi Dress (Available in Plus Size)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Plant-Based Fiber Blended products are made with at least 50% certified plant-based content and produced in a way that restricts the use of harmful chemicals. LENZING ECOVERO

features: FIT & FLARE: Fitted through chest and waist, flared to hem.
RAYON STRETCH JERSEY: This soft and drapey lightweight jersey has a smooth, polished finish. Also offered in a sustainably sourced option 95% Rayon (Lenzing Ecovero Viscose), 5% Elastane.

SUMMER MAXI DRESS: This versatile and figure-flattering maxi dress seamlessly transitions from day to night. Pair with your favorite sneakers for a day exploring the city or dress up for an evening out with Amazon Essentials Women's Two Strap Heeled Sandals.
DETAILS: Easy pull-on dress for all-day comfort. Features a gathered waist creating a flattering fit, scoop-neck, sleeveless styling with tank straps, and the perfect maxi length.
LENGTH: 52 1/2" from side neck on US size S.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Dress
reviews.reviewText: Finally! This dress is perfect. Perfectly comfortable, perfectly flattering, perfectly appropriate for almost any occasion - from casual to dressy.I love the soft feel and stretch. The fabric is cool, and yet dense enough to hide panty & bra lines AND it hides bulges and cellulite. THIS IS NOT SEE THROUGH!And it fits! Unlike most Amazon sizes that are smaller Asian sizing, this dress is really a good fit for a plus sized woman. And it is long enough. There is no shrinkage after washing and the gentle, high waisted design is very flattering for a woman with a problem belly. THERE IS NO SAUSAGE VIBE WITH THIS GARMENT. The fit is perfect - not baggy like a tent dress and not tight like a sausage. It is an easy, relaxed with no wrinkles or bunching.The design avoids all the pitfalls that usually crop up in plus-sized garments. The armholes do not gape (showing the bra), the shoulder straps do not show straps, the scoop neckline does not choke - NOR DOES IT SHOW CLEAVAGE. I cool, covered & modest, well-dressed, and fashionable. And since I bought it in 3 different colors and prints, I can tell you that the style and sizing is consistent from garment to garment.I only have one complaint - I wish it were available in more colors. I've purchased every variety available, but would have loved to find it in white, lighter prints, bright colors, jewel-tones, brown, prints, etc.It is sleeveless and needs a simple shrug to make it appropriate for three seasons. And if you are in a warm climate, it would work for all four seasons.Highly, highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for!! Comfortable and cute. Not see through either and not too long. Very happy with this purchase, highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This dress is very comfortable and great if your body tends to change a lot. I have gained a lot of weight within the past year and a half so it has been difficult shopping for clothes that fit well. I feel like I could wear this dress if I gain or lose weight. Material is breathable and good for the hot summer months. Depending on the brand, I can fit in small/medium on top and large on bottom. Although, with my size now I have been wearing a lot of my clothes in size "Large." Again, it really depends on the brand, but the dress I have is a "medium" and runs slightly big. I'm very bottom heavy (big butt) so this fits me well. It's very flattering. If I lose weight, I probably won't wear it and opt for something more fitted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am 5'9" and normally wear plus size 24-26 (3x in USA), but that size varies depending on the country of origin, and the manufacturer. Some places seem to think plus size is below 20, . .. so, MANY plus size women hesitate to buy clothing online.This is an Amazon Essentials tank maxi dress with elastic around the waist. It is a spandex blend, so the overall fabric is a very soft and flowy stretchy jersey knit that feels like cotton. It fits PERFECTLY! Even the armpit holes are the perfect size. Not too low. Not too high. The dress length is also perfect. It goes down to my ankles. Not dragging on the floor, and I'm not tripping over it. The elastic waist band isn't too tight, nor too loose. It has a scoop neck in front and back and is the right height. 3x is accurate. If I had gone down a size it would have been a bit clingy. If I had gone up a size it would have been baggy at the elastic waistband.I will DEFINATELY order more of these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty, but VERY thin
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to wear with a blazer. Looked great the first time I wore it. Gently handwashed it and now it's indecently thin and see-through. Disappointed as I wanted to wear it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dress for myself and I really like it. It’s very soft and fluffy and it doesn’t wrinkle like my other one dead I really like this. I wish it would come in more colors. I would order a couple more. It also washed up really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Dress was super soft I think it runs big , I’m 5’3 and 200 and hippy I got an XL and could have got an L. Well update when I wash it but super comfortable and nice looking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of compliments
reviews.reviewText: The color green stands out and I have had a lot of compliments. It's long, and for my 5'2" height, too long. But I saw a tip on how to shorten it by bunching it up underneath at the waist and binding the bunch with an elastic. It looks like a new design and it worked. It's not sheer at all and is very comfortable.
Es exactamente lo que estaba buscando.

Fit is exactly right for me. For reference, I ordered Medium: I'm 5'5", 145lbs, 37" bust, 30" waist. Gathered waist hits just right to skim over my tummy, flattering neckline without too much cleavage, armholes don't show my bra, and the length hits top of my foot so hem won't touch the ground if I wear flat sandals. Can dress up for informal outings or lounge at home! Would be perfect for travel. Fabric is soft flowing jersey, not thick yet not see-through. To be safe, I'll wash in cold and hang to dry to prevent shrinkage. I ordered Dark Grey Heather and Burgundy and will likely get some other colours too! Size was consistent for both colours. Of interest: a long Burgundy cardigan I just bought (also Amazon Essentials) is perfect colour match.

Este vestido es muy lindo, cómodo, relajado. El color gris oscuro se ve muy bonito y con accesorios luce incluso elegante. El único problema es que como mido 1.58 llega hasta el piso y arrastra ligeramente. Lo mandaré arreglar ya que no uso zapatos altos. Lo recomiendo!

Le vert est très beau, il réhausse la carnation et fait chic. La robe est fluide, ne nécessite pas de repassage. La couleur est stable lors des lavages.Attention, elle est très longue, et comme le tissu est un peu lourd, elle se détend et devient encore plus longue en la portant. Malgré mon 1m70 je dois porter des chaussures à talons pour ne pas marcher dessus.
